response.body:
[{"id":"62f9c8a5-c3aa-4873-afad-44e1ee01ed43","code":"ubuntu-14.04","name":"Ubuntu 14.04","account_id":null,"image_id":"637b163e-ca9c-42a8-bc02-d60e3025e9b2","volume_id":"65288478-50d0-4ab7-837e-18ddcf71ea5f","short_description":"Ubuntu 14.04.2 LTS","description":"","default_username":"ubuntu","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

# Setting the hostname correctly
hostname: $HOSTNAME
fqdn: $HOSTNAME
timezone: $TIMEZONE
manage_etc_hosts: true
disable_root: false

users:
  - name: $INITIAL_USER
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - $SSH_KEY
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    shell: /bin/bash
  - name: civostatsd
    shell: /bin/false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
    $INITIAL_USER:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
  expire: False

write_files:
-   content: |
      description "Civo Statistics Reporting Daemon"
      author "Absolute DevOps Ltd (Civo.com)"

      start on runlevel [2345]
      stop on shutdown
      exec start-stop-daemon --start -c civostatsd --exec /usr/bin/civostatsd
    path: /etc/init/civostatsd.conf
    permissions: 0644

runcmd:
  - sed -i -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no.*$/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
  - locale-gen en_GB.UTF-8
  - echo 'server="https://api.civo.com"' > /etc/civostatsd
  - echo 'token="$CIVOSTATSD_TOKEN"' >> /etc/civostatsd
  - chown civostatsd:civostatsd /etc/civostatsd
  - curl -s https://www.civo.com/civostatsd.sh | /bin/bash
"},{"id":"458ae900-30e0-4ade-bd68-d137d57d4e47","code":"centos-7","name":"CentOS 7","account_id":null,"image_id":"e17ec38a-1e77-4c45-bef3-569567c9b169","volume_id":"4741cb45-e8cd-49fb-937d-9314a939eaff","short_description":"CentOS 7 - aiming to be compatible with RHEL 7","description":"","default_username":"centos","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

# Setting the hostname correctly
hostname: $HOSTNAME
fqdn: $HOSTNAME
manage_etc_hosts: true
disable_root: false
ssh_pwauth: true

users:
  - name: $INITIAL_USER
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - $SSH_KEY
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    shell: /bin/bash
  - name: civostatsd
    shell: /bin/false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
    $INITIAL_USER:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
  expire: False

runcmd:
  - sed -i -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no.*$/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i -e 's/^#?ChallengeResponseAuthentication no.*$/ChallengeResponseAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i -e's/without-password/yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
  - echo 'server="https://api.civo.com"' > /etc/civostatsd
  - echo 'token="$CIVOSTATSD_TOKEN"' >> /etc/civostatsd
  - chown civostatsd:civostatsd /etc/civostatsd
  - curl -s https://www.civo.com/civostatsd.sh | /bin/bash
"},{"id":"67c4df28-8db8-48e5-84b3-d79b9d59920b","code":"centos-6","name":"CentOS 6","account_id":null,"image_id":"04d66ce1-f20e-4d84-a6d4-cdde5a07ff7e","volume_id":"a690dec8-831c-4f02-8a90-09d735dc6e48","short_description":"CentOS 6 - aiming to be compatible with RHEL 6","description":"","default_username":"centos","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

runcmd:

  - sed -i -e 's/^#?ChallengeResponseAuthentication no.*$/ChallengeResponseAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i -e's/without-password/yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
  - echo 'server="https://api.civo.com"' > /etc/civostatsd
  - echo 'token="$CIVOSTATSD_TOKEN"' >> /etc/civostatsd
  - chown civostatsd:civostatsd /etc/civostatsd
  - curl -s https://www.civo.com/civostatsd.sh | /bin/bash
"},{"id":"c2124658-0f9f-4d40-bb52-6288819fdc39","code":"debian-jessie","name":"Debian Jessie","account_id":null,"image_id":"38686161-ba25-4899-ac0a-54eaf35239c0","volume_id":"5c37a01d-342e-4732-9a59-79fcbc4c91f4","short_description":"Debian v8 (Jessie), old stable Debian release","description":"","default_username":"admin","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

# Setting the hostname correctly
hostname: $HOSTNAME
fqdn: $HOSTNAME
timezone: $TIMEZONE
manage_etc_hosts: true
disable_root: false

datasource_list:
  - Ec2

users:
  - name: $INITIAL_USER
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - $SSH_KEY
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    shell: /bin/bash
  - name: civostatsd
    shell: /bin/false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
    $INITIAL_USER:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
  expire: False

runcmd:
  - sed -i -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no.*$/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
  - echo 'server="https://api.civo.com"' > /etc/civostatsd
  - echo 'token="$CIVOSTATSD_TOKEN"' >> /etc/civostatsd
  - chown civostatsd:civostatsd /etc/civostatsd
  - wget -q -O - https://www.civo.com/civostatsd.sh | /bin/bash
"},{"id":"1427e49f-d159-4421-b6cc-34c43775764b","code":"coreos","name":"CoreOS","account_id":null,"image_id":"e5a2be4a-fb83-48e8-875d-5e5ff565c9e5","volume_id":null,"short_description":"CoreOS - lightweight Linux operating system built within containers","description":"","default_username":"core","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

# Setting the hostname correctly
hostname: $HOSTNAME
fqdn: $HOSTNAME
timezone: $TIMEZONE
manage_etc_hosts: "localhost"
disable_root: false

users:
  - name: $INITIAL_USER
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - $SSH_KEY
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    shell: /bin/bash

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
    $INITIAL_USER:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
  expire: False

runcmd:
  - sed -i -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no.*$/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
"},{"id":"5d61621a-f9c1-4261-b863-2a205792b12f","code":"ubuntu-17.04","name":"Ubuntu 17.04","account_id":null,"image_id":"a478ab7f-1ac0-4d86-9a57-e607b2bbbcf0","volume_id":null,"short_description":"Ubuntu 17.04","description":"","default_username":"ubuntu","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

# Setting the hostname correctly
hostname: $HOSTNAME
fqdn: $HOSTNAME
timezone: $TIMEZONE
manage_etc_hosts: true
disable_root: false

users:
  - name: $INITIAL_USER
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - $SSH_KEY
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    shell: /bin/bash
  - name: civostatsd
    shell: /bin/false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
    $INITIAL_USER:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
  expire: False

write_files:
-   content: |
      [Unit]
      Description=Civo Statistics Reporting Daemon

      [Service]
      ExecStart=/usr/bin/civostatsd
      User=civostatsd

      [Install]
      WantedBy=multi-user.target
    path: /etc/systemd/system/civostatsd.service

runcmd:
  - echo "net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1\nnet.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6 = 1\nnet.ipv6.conf.lo.disable_ipv6 = 1\n" > /etc/sysctl.d/99-cloudimg-ipv6.conf
  - /sbin/sysctl --system
  - sed -i -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no.*$/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
  - locale-gen en_GB.UTF-8
  - echo 'server="https://api.civo.com"' > /etc/civostatsd
  - echo 'token="$CIVOSTATSD_TOKEN"' >> /etc/civostatsd
  - chown civostatsd:civostatsd /etc/civostatsd
  - curl -s https://www.civo.com/civostatsd.sh | /bin/bash
"},{"id":"033c35a0-a8c3-4518-8114-d156a4d4c512","code":"debian-stretch","name":"Debian Stretch","account_id":null,"image_id":"2ffff07e-6953-4864-8ce9-1f754d70de31","volume_id":"b315f652-3e9c-48ce-97e0-14cd369c8cf0","short_description":"Debian v9 (Stretch), current stable Debian release","description":"","default_username":"admin","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

# Setting the hostname correctly
hostname: $HOSTNAME
fqdn: $HOSTNAME
timezone: $TIMEZONE
manage_etc_hosts: true
disable_root: false

datasource_list:
  - Ec2

users:
  - name: $INITIAL_USER
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - $SSH_KEY
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    shell: /bin/bash
  - name: civostatsd
    shell: /bin/false

chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
    $INITIAL_USER:$INITIAL_PASSWORD
  expire: False

runcmd:
  - sed -i -e 's/^PasswordAuthentication no.*$/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - sed -i '/PermitRootLogin/ s/.*/PermitRootLogin yes/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - service sshd restart
  - service ssh restart
  - echo 'server="https://api.civo.com"' > /etc/civostatsd
  - echo 'token="$CIVOSTATSD_TOKEN"' >> /etc/civostatsd
  - chown civostatsd:civostatsd /etc/civostatsd
  - wget -q -O - https://www.civo.com/civostatsd.sh | /bin/bash
"},{"id":"359494e6-2439-471e-a528-f8866dade6ba","code":"freebsd-11.1","name":"FreeBSD 11.1-RELEASE","account_id":null,"image_id":"8d3886df-c5c1-4efe-aa5a-659217b466a5","volume_id":null,"short_description":"FreeBSD 11.1-RELEASE - community image by Rainbow - https://www.twitter.com/Hacker_Horse","description":null,"default_username":"freebsd","cloud_config":"#cloud-config

hostname: $HOSTNAME

timezone: UTC
manage_etc_hosts: true
disable_root: false

runcmd:
  - rmuser -y beastie
  - pw useradd -n $INITIAL_USER -c "User Created by OpenStack" -m -s /bin/sh
  - "chpass $INITIAL_USER:::::::::$INITIAL_PASSWORD"
  - "chpass root:::::::::$INITIAL_PASSWORD"
  - mkdir /home/$INITIAL_USER/.ssh
  - echo "$SSH_KEY" > /home/$INITIAL_USER/.ssh/authorized_keys
  - sed -i -e "s/freebsd/$INITIAL_USER/g" /usr/local/etc/sudoers.d/10-cloudinit
  - "rm /usr/local/etc/sudoers.d/90-cloud-init-users"
  - "rm /usr/local/etc/sudoers.d/10-cloudinit-e""},{"id":"b0d30599-898a-4072-86a1-6ed2965320d9","code":"ubuntu-16.04","name":"Ubuntu 16.04","account_id":null,"image_id":"8b4d81e0-6283-4ea3-bbc4-478df568024e","volume_id":"abbb3d50-536a-4db8-85ae-95eb802b7771","short_description":"Ubuntu 16.04","description":null,"default_username":"ubuntu","cloud_config":"#cloud-config
